mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ho_hospitalization_request( HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_DATE) SELECT if(not exists (select * from ho_hospitalization_request) ,'hospitalization_request_1', CONCAT('hospitalization_request_', max(cast(substring(HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_CODE,25,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTreatmentCode}, now() FROM ho_hospitalization_request
mapper.select: SELECT ho_hospitalization_request.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_CODE, ho_hospitalization_request.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_hospitalization_request.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_DATE, ho_hospitalization_request.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_STATE_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME, ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE FROM ho_hospitalization_request JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_hospitalization_request.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE WHERE ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hoHospitalCode} AND ho_hospitalization_request.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_STATE_CODE = 1

SELECT ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_CODE, ho_hospitalization.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME, ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_CODE, ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_START_DATE, ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE FROM ho_hospitalization JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_hospitalization.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE WHERE ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hoHospitalCode} ho_hospitalization.HO_HOSPITALIZATION_STATE_CODE = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE ho_hospitalization SET HO_HOSPITALIZATION_END_DATE = now() WHERE HO_HOSPITALIZATION_CODE = #{hoHospitalizationCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ho_hospitalization( HO_HOSPITALIZATION_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_CODE, HO_HOSPITALIZATION_STATE_CODE, HO_HOSPITALIZATION_START_DATE) SELECT if(not exists (select * from ho_hospitalization) ,'hospitalization_1', CONCAT('hospitalization_', max(cast(substring(HO_HOSPITALIZATION_CODE,17,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoHospitalizationRequestCode}, 2, now() FROM ho_hospitalization
mapper.update: UPDATE ho_hospitalization_request SET HO_HOSPITALIZATION_STATE_CODE = 2 WHERE HO_HOSPITALIZATION_REQUEST_CODE = #{hoHospitalizationRequestCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ho_operation( HO_OPERATION_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_OPERATION_TYPE_CODE, HO_OPERATION_START_DATE, HO_GO_SENDSTATE) SELECT if(not exists (select * from ho_operation) ,'operation_1', CONCAT('operation_', max(cast(substring(HO_OPERATION_CODE,11,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoOperationTypeCode}, #{hoOperationStartDate}, 0 FROM ho_operation
mapper.select: SELECT ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_CODE, ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE, ho_operation.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME, ho_operation_type.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_NAME, ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_START_DATE FROM ho_operation JOIN ho_operation_type ON ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_CODE = ho_operation_type.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_CODE JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_operation.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE WHERE ho_treatment.HO_HOSPITAL_CODE=#{hoHospitalCode}

SELECT ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_CODE, ho_operation.HO_TREATMENT_CODE, ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_NAME, ho_operation_type.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_NAME, ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_START_DATE, ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_END_DATE, ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_DIARY FROM ho_operation JOIN ho_operation_type ON ho_operation.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_CODE = ho_operation_type.HO_OPERATION_TYPE_CODE JOIN ho_treatment ON ho_operation.HO_TREATMENT_CODE = ho_treatment.HO_TREATMENT_CODE JOIN ho_patient ON ho_treatment.HO_PATIENT_CODE = ho_patient.HO_PATIENT_CODE WHERE HO_OPERATION_CODE = #{hoOperationCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE ho_operation SET HO_OPERATION_END_DATE = #{hoOperationEndDate}, HO_OPERATION_DIARY = #{hoOperationDiary} WHERE HO_OPERATION_CODE = #{hoOperationCode}
